name: Calculate Hours PAGA SAT Procedure
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(PAGA SAT Procedure:[IF](<*ISSELECTED(PAGA_Implementation_Methodology.Non-Standard Build Estimate)*>){<* Eval((4*(<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_PAGA_Cabinets)*>+<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_Digital_Output_Modules_(DOM))*>))+((<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_Reviews_(add Asbuilts))*>*(<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_PAGA_Cabinets)*>+<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_Digital_Output_Modules_(DOM))*>))*0.5)) *>}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(PAGA_Implementation_Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,<*ISSELECTED(PAGA_GES_Location.None)*>)){<* Eval(<* Eval((4*(<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_PAGA_Cabinets)*>+<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_Digital_Output_Modules_(DOM))*>))+((<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_Reviews_(add Asbuilts))*>*(<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_PAGA_Cabinets)*>+<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_Digital_Output_Modules_(DOM))*>))*0.5)) *>*0.5) *>}{<* Eval(<* Eval((4*(<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_PAGA_Cabinets)*>+<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_Digital_Output_Modules_(DOM))*>))+((<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_Reviews_(add Asbuilts))*>*(<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_PAGA_Cabinets)*>+<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_Digital_Output_Modules_(DOM))*>))*0.5)) *>*0.5*1.15) *>}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF])*>
